question: In which {location} was {col} the {stats} during the COVID-19 lockdown (April 2020)?
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    data = main_data[(main_data["Timestamp"].dt.month == 4) & (main_data["Timestamp"].dt.year == 2020)]
    data = data.groupby("{code_location}")["{code_col}"].mean().reset_index()
    data = data.dropna(subset=["{code_col}"])
    data = data.sort_values(by=["{code_col}"])
    print(data.iloc[{code_stats}]["{code_location}"])


true_code()
